text: The 2010–11 Chicago Blackhawks season was the team's 85th season in the National Hockey League (NHL). The team suffered from salary cap restrictions and lost several players due to it. They also had to recover from winning their first Stanley Cup in 40 years. The team was defeated in the first round of the Stanley Cup Playoffs by the Presidents' Trophy-winning Vancouver Canucks. == Regular season == == Playoffs == Game # Date Visitor Home Score OT Series 1 April 13 Blackhawks Canucks 2 - 0 Vancouver leads series 1 - 0 2 April 15 Blackhawks Canucks 4 - 3 Vancouver leads series 2 - 0 3 April 17 Canucks Blackhawks 3 - 2 Vancouver leads series 3 - 0 4 April 19 Canucks Blackhawks 7 - 2 Vancouver leads series 3 - 1 5 April 21 Blackhawks Canucks 5 - 0 Vancouver leads series 3 - 2 6 April 24 Canucks Blackhawks 4 - 3 OT Series tied 3 - 3 6 April 26 Blackhawks Canucks 2 - 1 OT Canucks win series 4 - 3 == References == Category:2010 in ice hockey Category:2011 in ice hockey Category:National Hockey League team seasons
title: 2010–11 Chicago Blackhawks season
